refnamediv.refpurpose: awards a kill to on attacker if their victim suicides

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: g_fear awards a kill to on attacker if their victim suicides during the specified time period. Time is in milliseconds, and anything above 0 enables this feature. If the time between the time an attacker hits a victim and the time the victim suicides is less than the time specified by g_fear, a kill is awarded to that attacker.
